name: Dinosaur Garbage Truck - Games for kids
description: Drive and control up to 5 unique garbage trucks! Clean the garbage-piled sidewalks and spider web in the mess culvert. The city traffic was trouble after snow, you can shovel the snow away from roads and provide vehicle guidance! And even, blast ruins to pieces with your hammer truck!  Collect and take the trash to recycling center. For example, the car transfer to specific place and crush into pieces. You will also take away the hood and tires from a car, then break it up. Collect all the trash into a giant machine that can dispose garbage. The process of disposing garbage are full of surprises and fun interactions!  The rubbish gave out a smelly gas that directly influence the city environment and dinosaur residents.  Drive around to become a little environmental guardian! Pick up your trucks and start your adventures!  Features >Five unique garbage trucks to choose from such as Snow Blower,Sweeper Truck,Forklift ect. >Observing how the garbage trucks work. >Learn about waste and waste sorting. >Fun animation and sound effects. >No third-party advertising.  About Yateland Yateland develops apps for kids and families to enjoy. Our games inspire preschoolers across the globe to create, imagine, and adventure! As we make games for your children to enjoy, we are guided by our vision: children love. Parents trust.
